Workers placing beta unit in track
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Four men are operating a wheeled machine in front of numbered units each with the warning, "Danger, Keep watches & iron materials outside line."
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Industrial technicians; Interiors; Signs; Y-12 Plant
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See Y12 0480 for a similar image.
